response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $15,000 to us, reflecting its quality and the effort put into its creation. Given its worth to both parties, we propose an offer of $14,500 for this product. We believe this price not only provides you with a great opportunity to acquire it but also allows us to maintain a fair transaction. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14500}
